text: The eldest son of a Nuln noble, Morgan found his calling as a mercenary captain, gaining a fearsome reputation as a sellsword.
Only through training and experience do these men find mastery of mounted combat.
It's as if they were born in the saddle and have never left its embrace.
These weapons are far superior to the mass-produced imperial steel.
After many campaigns in faraway lands, all manner of strange blades are wielded, forged by men, dwarfs and elves.
It's a truly difficult art to wield a sword and shield from horseback.
These men have no fear, they charge into the thick of battle and doggedly keep on fighting.
Specially crafted to allow for the best protection and manoeuvrability.
Forged by the greatest dwarfen smiths.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are powerful beings who can decapitate a dragon or plunge a sword into the heart of a gryphon in one mighty strike.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward�s bearer.
A mercenary army with honour such as the Grudgebringers know that bravery on the field keeps the coffers full and jobs a plenty
Increases the unit size of Bernhardt's personal cavalry unit.
Leader of the reknowned Grudgebringer mercenary army
The wily Paymaster to the Grudgebringers, prompt with the mens payment and haggling the best pay.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
Countless battles teach mercenaries to fight with different kinds of enemies.
It's unclear as time goes by what drives Bernhardt, Glory, Gold or Bloodlust but either way he will see it through to the end.
Bernhardt and his men are no stranger to cutting down Greenskins and have done so over much of the Old World.

This enchanted horn has the power to panic enemies and calm friendly troops with a single blast. When sounded, all enemy regiments within earshot may flee and all fleeing friendly regiments within range will rally themselves.

This mighty sword has runes inscribed along the blade by a Bright magic Wizard Lord. In hand-to-hand combat the wielder strikes more accurately and ferociously against his enemies. Also, a fireball may be cast from the sword.
This sword is enchanted with the energy of Bright magic. Its magical power may be cast when the wielder is in melee, unleashing a fiery blast which wounds any troops in the vicinity.

This mighty sword channels the energy of Celestial magic through its blade. In hand-to-hand combat a successful strike wounds the enemy automatically, regardless of any armour he may be wearing. When the wielder is in melee it may be cast, summoning multiple lightning bolts from the sky which strike the enemy regiment.

Forged by a great Dwarf runesmith as a gift to the Empire, this sword has powerful Dwarf runes carved upon its blade. The sword strikes with such force it penetrates all armour, and any undead troops hit by the sword suffer twice the normal damage.
The Enchanted Shield provides the bearer's regiment with an extra level of armour. This item can only be utilised by troops who are normally able to use a shield.

The Shield of Ptolos is magically inscribed with a myriad of distracting patterns and designs. The patterns magically distract arrows and bolts, sending them spinning off course. The bearer's regiment will be protected against missiles from bows, crossbows, war engines and so on. Additionally, the shield provides the bearer's regiment with a basic level of armour.

The Spelleater Shield is inscribed with symbols which have the power to absorb enemy magic. Whenever the bearer's regiment is the target of an enemy spell the shield has a good chance of absorbing the magic and channelling its power to any friendly mages. The shield can also negate the effects of enemy magic items. Additionally, the shield provides the bearer's regiment with a basic level of armour.
This magic helmet protects the bearer's regiment from the effects of fire or flame attacks. The magical powers are so effective that almost all such attacks will be ineffective.

This powerful wand channels the energy of the winds of magic, providing the bearer with extra magical powers. Any spell in the bearer's repertoire can be cast for fewer magic points than it would normally cost, to a minimum of one point.

The banner of Arcane Warding is inscribed with sigils to twist magic aside and deflect it in unpredictable paths. When a hostile spell is cast against a regiment bearing this banner the spell is likely to be either negated or deflected towards the closest enemy regiment.
This hallowed banner has been infused with power and can lash the enemy with bolts of pure energy. It may be cast, unleashing up to six mighty lightning bolts upon enemy troops within range

This powerful banner infuses the bearer's regiment with extra courage, making them braver and more determined. A regiment bearing this banner will never break from hand-to-hand combat and is immune to fear.
These warriors are veterans of the "Shadow of the Horned Rat" campaign. They learned the hard way how to stop the Vermintide.
These warriors are veterans of the "Dark Omen" campaign. They know all to well, that the dead should not disturb the living and ensure they a put back to rest.
Many regiments have come and gone but those few that bear the Grudgebringer name have developed a brotherhood like no other.
If death is a reward, I'll take it in gold coin, old friend. The glory we'll leave for others.
I don't give a damn about glory, I do what I must.
Hack, hack and hack again, such is the bloody work of the mercenary.
Bernhardt knows it's easier to hack down his enemies after softening them up with a few volleys.
These mercenaries are legends of the battlefield, with few to call their equals.
New troops are always needed for a Mercenaries work is the most dangerous.
Like any skill the more you do it the better you get and Looting is no exception.
Mercenaries have no qualms hitching a ride with trade caravans, saves them walking and the merchants get protection.

After so risking his life on so many adventures for gold and glory, Commander Bernhardt's luck has finally dried out. Rumours abound though, about an inkeeper in Ubersreik who looks an awful lot like him...
Witch Hunter Generals is a title given to only the most devout and most accomplished Witch Hunters, taking orders only from the Lord Protector or the Supreme Council.

Matthias’ training in melee combat is nothing to scoff at but his skilled marksmanship is what truly elevates him above other Witch Hunters. He is capable of expertly delivering holy justice with his silver flintlock.

Witch Hunters who spend a majority of their lives hunting evil sometimes begin to see the marks of Chaos everywhere. Officially, men who go to these extremes are stipped of their rank and branded “Renegade Witch Hunters”. However, many within the Order, like Matthias, have gone too far in their pursuit of vanquishing evil.

I am the surgeon of sin. I cut it out wherever I find it. Where there are witches I seek them out and burn them. Any Sorcerers I find, I prolong thier torture until death. No sinner escapes my righteous Wrath\\n– Matthias
Once he is convinced of something, Matthias cannot be swayed to think otherwise. Even when the accused plead their innocence to Sigmar and Matthias himself as they are burned alive.

Though most Witch Hunters are either considered to be heroes or scum who are no different to the ones they burn alive, Matthias is widely distructed and feared by those outside of the Holy Order of the Templars of Sigmar for his methods of delivering justice.
Ludwig's bodyguard detachment of Imperial Halberdiers were cut down by Greenskin filith and now he seeks revenge for his fallen brothers.
While Ludwig's steam tank is being repaired, his loyal dwarfs have built a steam weapon that can be comfortably used on horseback.
The repair of the tank will soon be completed, but some more time is needed. To great luck, the dwarves from Ludwig's team managed to get a working gyrobomber and fasten a volley gun to it
The steam tank will be available once the tank crew finish their repairs.
Only those who are adept at swordsmanship and stealth are permitted to be Rangers in Asrai society.
Years of stalking the despised Ratmen has made Ceridan a feared individual amongst Skavendom. Ceridan often shares his experiences around campfires to any who would listen.
Ceridan was born with natural affinity towards hunting and swordplay, a valuable trait for any aspiring Rangers.

Ceridan prefers to work alone as he believes himself to be most efficient when he doesn’t have to worry about others. Like the time he spent in the black Mountains, gathering information to use against the Skaven.
Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar to the Empire, relaying messages from the High King Grudgebearer to Emperor Franz.
With his unnatural gift of persuasion, Engrol can twist any situation to be of benefit to his lords and allies.
Engrol is famous for striking lucrative trade deals where even the most experienced businessmen have failed.
Engrol’s bodyguard are fierce warriors who are completely loyal and will protect him in battle to the very last.
Engrol’s skills in diplomacy are unnaturally proficient for a Dwarf and he has resolved many quarrels with the Empire in his career spanning over two centuries.

Morgan Bernhardt commands the renowned mercenary company known as The Grudgerbringers. Famous all over the Old World, from Bernhardt’s homeland of Reikland to the lands of the Border Princes and the far eastern empires.
It takes great leadership and charisma to lead such a disorderly bunch into war…
The Grudgebringers are mostly consisted of a rag tag group of Men, Elves, Dwarves and Ogres held together by Bernhardt’s skilled leadership.

Despite leading a mercenary company, Bernhardt is still very loyal to his homeland of Reikland and its Emperor. Bernhardt’s company is often entrusted with carrying out dangerous missions by Franz himself.

Bernhardt and his company have lead many attacks against the vile Ratmen. One such attack was the campaign to stop the infamous Grey Seer Thanquol from using magical Elven stones to destroy the realms of men, known as the Shadow of the Horned Rat

Bernhardt has also had skirmishes against the undead servants of Nagash, the most notable being the resurrection of one of Nagash’s commanders, The Dread King, who was stopped before he could wreak havoc upon the world by Bernhardt and his men.
Bernhardt has slayed monsters of all kinds during his many campaigns against the Undead, Greenskins and Ratmen; he is truly a man who fears very little.

Bernhardt, who started out as a simple mercenary interested in making quick money, turned into a respected man, both amongst his band and the greater world; his deeds spread all over the Old World and beyond.
Matthias's personal War Wagon a hybrid of a heavy chariot with a combat platform and a carriage.
Standing atop an Oath Stone, a Thane increases the resolve of his followers and ensures that all foes find him.
Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.
Right hand of the Ice Queen
Often the most dangerous assault comes from the enemy you least expect.
Fear the might of the Storm!
The steam tank Ignis Draconis was the first tank built by Leonardo of Miragliano.
This one is well-versed in the various court intrigues of the Asur, which is something of an advantage in matters of diplomacy.
The Realms of Man must not fall.
He is well known enough to them to gain access to certain high-caste individuals.
This kind of spell is nothing to the Vladimir
Deadliest tip arrow can ever have

Vladimir Stormbringer can harness the power of blizzards to enhance the speed of his troops. With a wave of his hand, he summons a freezing storm that swirls around his army, reducing the drag on their movements and allowing them to cover ground with ease. The biting winds of the blizzard invigorate the troops, filling them with an icy determination to reach their destination quickly. With this skill, Vladimir's troops can move at a rapid pace, cutting through snowdrifts and icy terrain to outflank their enemies and seize key positions.
Vladimir creates a shield of wind and lightning that deflects blows and stuns foes who try to breach it. This skill allows Vladimir and his troops to weather savage attacks and regroup.
Vladimir channels the power of the storm to shorten his spell cooldown time, allowing him to cast his spells more frequently to harness the enemy
His stubborn anger will see nothing stop him.
Just with a mere thought, he can manipulate the flames to burn even hotter and longer, while requiring less of his own energy to sustain it.
The wind flows through me. It controls me!
Against the undead, Luther's fills the mens hearts with fire and light!
Stand firm men, that which is dead may still burn.
His spells are like infernos, leaving nothing but ash and cinders in their wake. His enemies quickly learn to fear the searing heat of his magic.
Nothing is beyond that of which he dreams, with old hands he deftly put to fruition his machinations.

This splendid elven sword contains a piece of rune crystal attached to the shaft. It has magical properties that detect the presence of dwarves and in doing so sharpen the blade to double its fineness, giving the welder more destructive potential.
Bright and angry glow the Runes of Fury, the weapons that hold them almost jumping out of their wielders' hands in desperation to strike the foe.
A Dwarf wielding a weapon bearing the Runes of Might can fell a Giant in a flurry of axe blows.
A weapon with this rune moves to block incoming attacks, making its wielder extremely hard to hit.
The Rune of Striking causes the weapon to hit the foe’s most vulnerable area with an uncanny precision.
They search warp stone. They have no respect, they spawn evil
Bestowed with unwavering power, Allor intervenes with his Amber magic to ensure the survival of Ceridan and Carlsson in their direst moments
He preserves life and restores vitality in the face of peril
Infused with Amber's might, Allor imparts reduced winds of magic costs and cooldowns, hastening spellcasting with unparalleled mastery
While Ludwig's steam tank is being repaired, he get in Nuln mechanical steed which was created by the greatest engineer Chaos Robie
A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

After fighting a mighty dragon and Greenskins together at Khaz Drakk, the Dragons Hall, Gotrek formed one of his many unlikely bonds. If Gotrek is by chance adventuring nearby he would always aid his old friends.
